title: How to update Hulu on a Samsung Blu-ray - Quora

response.answer_text: Download the Hulu app on the latest Samsung TVs and Blu-ray players by following these steps: Press Home on your remote to access the Smart Hub.Select Apps, then search for “Hulu” using the magnifying glass icon in the top-right corner.Follow the on-screen prompts to complete the installation process.Please follow me!
